handoff.one_sentence_goal: Build a production-ready single-page landing page for CognOS that emphasizes trust-infrastructure for developers and AI product teams.
handoff.problem_statement: CognOS needs an effective landing page that communicates its offering and builds trust among developers and AI product teams while driving conversions.
objective: Create a visually appealing and informative landing page.
Highlight key features and benefits of CognOS.
Encourage visitors to explore the GitHub repository and onboarding documentation.
scope_in: Clear sections for feature overview, advantages, and testimonials.
Call-to-action buttons linked to GitHub and onboarding docs.
SEO optimized headers and meta descriptions.
functional_requirements: Header section with logo and navigation.
Hero section with a strong value proposition and CTA buttons.
Feature section detailing key capabilities of CognOS.
Testimonial section featuring quotes from existing users.
Footer with links to GitHub, onboarding docs, and contact information.
acceptance_criteria: Landing page loads within 3 seconds on standard internet connections.
CTAs successfully redirect to respective GitHub and onboarding pages.
Page is fully responsive across major devices and browsers.
All sections are present and visually cohesive.
handoff.lovable_build_prompt: Build a production-ready single-page landing page for CognOS with the following specifications: Include a Header with navigation, a Hero section with a value proposition and clear CTAs, a Features section highlighting CognOS capabilities, a Testimonials section with user feedback, and a Footer with links to GitHub and onboarding documentation. DO NOT implement a multi-page layout, backend functionalities, user authentication, or a content management system. Ensure SEO optimization and responsiveness across devices.
handoff.qa_test_prompt: Verify that the landing page meets the acceptance criteria: Check that the page loads within the required time, ensure all CTAs function correctly, test responsiveness on various devices and browsers, and confirm all sections are present and visually cohesive.
